overall.description: Return a string representation of a number in the given base system.

number.description: The value to convert. Positive and negative values are handled.

base.description: Convert number to the base number system. The valid range is 2-36, the default value is 2.

padding.description: Number of zeros padded on the left. Default is 0 (no padding).

out.description: String representation of number in base system.
